location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of a truck in the desert. Photographer unknown.

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:83 mm x 112 mmCondition:The photograph is in good condition. There are faint black marks on the left-hand edge of the print, possibly a finger or thumbprint.Foliation:The photograph bears two numbers: a circled 58 and an uncircled 139. The folio number that should be used for referencing purposes is on the plastic sleeve in which the photograph is held (50)Process:Silver-gelatin

mods.abstract: Subject Matter:Photograph of a six-wheel flatbed truck, used by the California Arabian Standard Oil Company at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia, and situated in the middle distance of a desert scene. The truck is seen from behind and to one side, and is loaded with a cargo, including oil drums. The surrounding desert is flat and generally featureless.
